text: Yi Bong-chool or Lee Bong-chool (1925–1992) was an officer for the Republic of Korea.Dong Wah Graphic magazine 1967. ==Background== Yi Bong-chol was born in 1925 in Haman County, South Gyeongsang Province. He was in the landings of Inchon and Tong young during the Korean War. ==Family== Married to Ku Boo-ja, and father of two children. ==References== Category:South Korean businesspeople Category:Korean generals Category:1992 deaths Category:1925 births Category:People from Haman County Category:20th-century businesspeople
title: Yi Bong-chool
